Package jhd.DistanceMaps.libJ8

Contains methods for computing distance transforms in 2D and 3D images. Anisotropic image pixel/voxel dimensions are supported.

  1. Computing the exact 2D and 3D Euclidean distance map (EDM) using Danielsson's algorithm.
         Danielsson P.E. Euclidean distance mapping. Computer Graphics Image Processing, 14, 1980, pp. 227-248.
  2. Drawing Euclidean spheres.
  3. Computing the 2D and 3D geodesic distance transform (GDT) by serial propagation.
  4. Finding the shortest path to a source point in a GDT mapped image
  5. Simulation of non-wetting invasion of random porous media using EDM and sphere drawing for resolved porosity, gray level flood for unresolved porosity and GDT for tortuosity of flooded path.

All calculations are done in-place, on the supplied image data.

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    EuclideanSpheres
    Class for drawing Euclidean spheres scaled in image units
    EuclideanSpheres.RandomSphereParams
    Nested class to simplify random sphere draw arguments list
    int pixWidth, pixHeight and pixDepth are the pixel dimensions in user units (cm, inches etc.).
    EuclideanSpheres.SphereParams
    Nested class to simplify sphere draw arguments list
    pixWidth, pixHeight and pixDepth are the pixel dimensions in user units (cm, inches etc.).
    ExactEuclideanMap
    Functions for computing the exact 2D and 3D Euclidean distance using Danielsson's algorithm.
    FloodFill3D
    3D gray-scale flood filler using brushfire algorithm
    GDT3D_V6
    Methods for 2D and 3D Geodesic transform and tortousity
    HybridFloodFill_V3
    Class for simulation of non-wetting imbibition into random porous media with both resolved and unresolved porosity
    HybridFloodFill_V3.FloodParams
    Experimental data structure passed to Flood_Fill
    HybridFloodFill_V3.FloodReport
    Data structure returned by hybridFloodFill
    HybridFloodFill_V3.FloodStats
    A data structure returned by hybridFloodFill
    HybridFloodFill_V3.PorosityReport
    A data structure returned by characterize and hybridFloodFill
    Offsets
    Static class for describing offsets
    Offsets.OffsetDesc
    Class for 2D and 3D pixel offset and value information
    Offsets.PointDesc
    Class for 3D pixel I,J,K and value information
